name: Diversity Mortgage
what_you_do: Cindy Ertman is a Success Strategist, National Mortgage Trainer, Best-Selling Author, Speaker, and Coach who helps individuals and businesses grow through a heart-centered and relationship-based approach.
who_you_serve: Cindy serves professionals in the mortgage industry and individuals seeking personal and professional growth.
bio: One of the nation’s Top 100 Mortgage Executives and Top 100 Originators in the U.S. for over a decade.
business_focus: Cindy Ertman is a Success Strategist, National Mortgage Trainer, Best-Selling Author, Speaker, and Coach who helps individuals and businesses grow through a heart-centered and relationship-based approach. (coaching)
